subject: Football
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The owner of the Cleveland Browns, Randy Lerner, reached a deal to sell the club to Jimmy Haslam III, a truck-stop magnate who is the brother of the Tennessee governor and a minority stockholder in the rival Pittsburgh Steelers, the Browns’ president, Mike Holmgren, said.
